thread.title: Annual 300 Club fundraiser kicks off season with early bird drawing
thread.title_full: Annual 300 Club fundraiser kicks off season with early bird drawing

title: Annual 300 Club fundraiser kicks off season with early bird drawing
text:
Courtesy Photo 300 Club Early Bird Drawing 
Seen here, from left, are Char Hebekeuser, 300 Club co-event coordinator; Rick Wheeler, of the Corunna Athletic Club; Susan Montenegro, of the Owosso Rotary; Heidi O’Dea, of the Owosso Rotary; Jorri Tremain, of the Corunna Rotary; and Kelly Jackson, co-event coordinator. Posted: Monday, September 28, 2015 10:51 am Annual 300 Club fundraiser kicks off season with early bird drawing 0 comments 
OWOSSO TWP. — The 34th annual 300 Club Sports Party and Raffle conducted its early bird drawing Thursday at The D’Mar Banquet & Conference Center. 
The drawing kicks off this year’s fundraising campaign. In all, 95 early bird tickets were in the drum. Mary Lou Triggs was the purchaser of the winning ticket and claimed the $100 early bird prize. kAm%96 3:8 C277=6 H:== 36 }@G] f 2E s’|2C]k^Am kAm%96 AFCA@D6 @7 E96 6G6?E :D E@ C2:D6 7F?5D E@ DFAA@CE E96 ~H@DD@ $A@CED q@@DE6CD[ E96 r@CF??2 pE9=6E:4 r=F3 2?5 E96 #@E2CJ 4=F3D @7 ~H@DD@ 2?5 r@CF??2]k^Am kAm~G6C E96 A2DE `b J62CD[ E96 6G6?E 92D C2:D65 >@C6 E92?
